titleStmt.title: Another godly letter, lately written to the same H.H. by his owne sister out of the countrey, about eighty miles from London
titleStmt.author: A. H.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from STC (2nd ed.).
Signed at end: Iuly 22. 1625. Resting, Your true louing Sister, A.H.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
